body:
Semicolons are inserted automatically in certain cases: https://golang.org/ref/spec#Semicolons

The second program is invalid, you *are not allowed* to have opening curly brace on a new line. This was introduced a few years ago and was an undesirable, but unavoidable side effect.
Since having opening curly brace on new line was against the style guide anyways, this was considered acceptable.

The error says "unexpected semicolon **or newline** before {". So that seems to be working as intended.
